basics.name: Ruan Shijie
basics.label: Computer Science Student
basics.summary: Undergraduate student majoring in Computer Science at Southwest Jiaotong University - Leeds Joint School.

work.name: Wistron Corporation (Zhongshan) Co., Ltd.
work.summary: Familiar with ASP.NET framework and database management. Gained understanding of software development lifecycle from requirements to server deployment and operations. Learned Linux Ubuntu server cluster deployment and cloud-native architecture. Completed a student course selection management system based on ASP.NET Core Blazor.

volunteer.summary: Responsible for organizing and managing student innovation and practice activities.
Led the Cybersecurity Association, organizing CTF competitions and cybersecurity training activities.

projects.name: Multi-Agent Collaborative Autonomous Driving Scene Generation Framework Based on LLM
projects.summary: National-level University Student Innovation Training Program project (2025). Focus on developing a framework for generating autonomous driving scenarios using Large Language Models and multi-agent collaboration.

projects.name: Machine Learning for Computer Vision Course
projects.summary: Participated in the '2024 International Top Innovative Talent Training Program' at Southwest Jiaotong University. Completed the full English course 'Machine Learning for Computer Vision' taught by Professor Jens Rittscher from the Department of Engineering Science, University of Oxford. Systematically learned core algorithm principles including image processing, object detection, image segmentation, deep learning, and visual motion analysis. Focused on cutting-edge applications such as face recognition, autonomous driving, and medical image analysis. Completed multiple computer vision programming practice tasks using Python.

projects.name: Southwest Jiaotong University CTF-OJ Platform
projects.summary: Created and operated the CTF Online Judge platform for Southwest Jiaotong University, providing a platform for cybersecurity competitions and training.

projects.name: Southwest Jiaotong University Cybersecurity Association Wiki
projects.summary: Created and operated the wiki platform for the Southwest Jiaotong University Cybersecurity Association, providing resources and documentation for cybersecurity learning and competitions.
